title: Customer Support Ecommerce
job_overview:
About the Role
We’re a fast-growing e-commerce brand in the wellness niche, selling supplements focused on lymphatic support, detox, and general well-being. Our business is built on direct-to-consumer sales and powered by paid ads (Meta/Facebook).

We’re looking for a Customer Support Manager who can handle day-to-day support tasks, manage subscription-related inquiries, and use tools like Shopify and ChatGPT to improve efficiency and customer experience.

? Your Responsibilities
Respond to customer messages via email (and possibly chat)

Handle subscription management (cancellations, misunderstandings, billing questions)

Use ChatGPT to improve response quality and speed

Track support KPIs and customer feedback

Build and maintain SOPs, templates, and macros

Communicate with fulfillment partners regarding order/shipping issues

Help build out the support team over time

???? What You’ll Need
1+ year experience in e-commerce customer support

Experience with Shopify is required

Strong written English and a helpful, friendly tone

Calm and clear communication when handling frustrated customers

Comfortable using ChatGPT as a support tool

Bonus: Familiarity with subscription apps like Appstle or Recharge

???? Tools We Use
Shopify

Appstle Subscriptions

ChatGPT

Gorgias or similar

Google Workspace

???? Important Application Note:
You must include the word “Lymphatic” in your application headline to be considered.

???? How to Apply
Please apply directly through the portal. We look forward to hearing from you!
